articles.title: Bitcoin drops below $20k, Ether cracks $1k – what this means
articles.description: A huge Rube Goldberg machine slapstick custard pie clown car, where each custard pie triggers three more custard pies.
articles.content:
I was woken at eight this morning (BST) by my Signal pinging repeatedly. Bitcoin had finally broken $20,000 dropping $1,200 in five minutes. I declare this bubble conclusively popped.

articles.title: Can Bitcoin Reach $100,000?
